entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness then 30 percent chance of flurries late this morning and early this afternoon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023
